cards.evo_description: This world vacillates between good and evil like a rocking cradle. Who wishes to disturb this tranquility with wretched change? That is heresy, and heresy is sin. Superior or inferior, those who break this principle will be condemned.

Well, now that you've seen me, let's go ahead and make a new world order. If you're the light of this world, then I'm the darkness that will engulf it in chaos.
